title: VA - Plantation Gold - 2CD 2009
description:
Fans of offbeat country music will be pleased to learn that Australia's Omni Recording Corporation label has just released a wealth of super-rare Nashville recordings from the 1960s and 70s made for Shelby Singleton's Plantation label (and a number of its off-shoots, such as SSS). Plantation Gold features a generous assortment of honky-tonkers, tearjerkers, quirky instrumentals, topical numbers, recitations, answer songs, yodel tunes, Japanese hillbillies, hyper-patriotic flag wavers and even some bona fide psychedelic and pop-flavored country tunes. (wfmu.org)

- - -

VA - Plantation Gold 1967-1976 -
The Mad Genius of Shelby S. Singleton Jr. & Plantation/SSS Records
